name: Object-based Visual Application Language File
summary: An OVX file is a data file used to develop applications for Psion devices, such as Netpad, Workabout, and MC 400. It contains Object-based Visual Application Language (OVAL), which is a programming language similar to Visual Basic. OVX files are no longer used since Psion computers have been discontinued.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
